questions.question_text: E brahma thaki Parabrahma je Purushottam Nārāyan te nokhā chhe ne e brahmanā paņ kāran chhe ne ādhār chhe ne _____ chhe.
questions.explanation: The Vachanamrut states: 'E brahma thaki Parabrahma je Purushottam Nārāyan te nokhā chhe ne e brahmanā paņ kāran chhe ne ādhār chhe ne prerak chhe.'

questions.question_text: Deh îndriya aru man ādik ke, sangme nahi lapțāve... sant 1
questions.explanation: This line is from a Kirtan.

questions.question_text: Pruthvi jenī rākhī sthir rahī chhe ne dolāvī dole chhe tathā ā tārāmandal jenu rākhyu adhar rahyu chhe tathā jenā varasāvyā megh varshe chhe tathā jenī āgnāe karīne sūrya-chandra uday-astapaņāne pāme chhe tathā chandramānī kaļā vadhe-ghațe chhe tathā pāļ vināno samudra jenī _____ rahe chhe tathā jaļnā bindumāthī manushya utpanna thây chhe ane tene hath, pag, nāk, kān e ādik das indriyo thaī āve chhe tathā ākāshne vishe adhar jaļ rākhī mūkyu chhe ane temā gāj-vīj thây chhe, evā anant āshcharya chhe te sarve mane malyā evā je Bhagwān tenā karyā thāy chhe.
questions.explanation: The Vachanamrut says that 'pāļ vināno samudra jenī maryādāmā rahe chhe'.

questions.question_text: Jīva Ishwar taņo re, māyā kāļ purush pradhān; Sahune vash karu re, sahuno prerak hu Bhagwan..6
questions.explanation: This is a line from a Kirtan.

questions.question_text: Bhagwānnī mūrtinu baļ atishay rākhavu je, 'Sarvoparī ne sadā divya sākārmūrti ane sarva avatārnu avatārī evu je Bhagwānnu swarūp chhe te ja mane prāpt thayu chhe.' Ane je em jāņato hoy ne tethī jo kadāchit satsangthī bāher nīsarī javāņu toy pan tene Bhagwānnī mūrtimāthī het țaļatu nathī ane te hamaņā to satsangthī bāher chhe pan deh mūkīne to ante Bhagwānnu je Akshardhām tene vishe Bhagwānne _____ jashe.
questions.explanation: According to Vachanamrut, such a person will go near Bhagwan: 'Bhagwānne samīpe jashe'.

questions.question_text: E je ekras tej chhe tene ātmā kahie tathā brahma kahīe ne _____ kahīe; ane e prakāshne vishe je Bhagwānnī mūrti chhe tene ātmānu tattva kahīe tathā Parabrahma kahīe tathā Purushottam kahīe...Je tejne vișhe mūrti chhe te ja pratyaksh Mahārāj chhe,' em jāņajo.
questions.explanation: The Vachanamrut states: 'E je ekras tej chhe tene ātmā kahie tathā brahma kahīe ne Akshardhām kahīe'.

questions.question_text: Jevu paroksh Bhagwānnā Rām-Krushņādik avatārnu māhātmya jāņe chhe tathā Nārad, Sanakādik, Shukjī, Jad-Bharat, Hanuman, Uddhav ityādik je parokșh sādhu tenu jevu māhātmya jāņe chhe tevu ja pratyaksh evā je Bhagwān tathā te Bhagwānnā bhakta _____ tenu māhātmya samaje tene kalyānnā mārgmā kāīye samajavu bākī rahyu nahī. Te ā vārtā ek vār kahye samajo athavā lākh vār kahye samajo, āj samajo athavā lākh varsh kede samajo pan e vat samajye ja chhūtako chhe.
questions.explanation: The Vachanamrut says: 'Bhagwānnā bhakta sādhu tenu māhātmya samaje'.

questions.question_text: Vālmiki vakhāniyā vānarne, vyāse vakhāniyā pashupal; Te pragat bhakti pratāpthi, vādhiyo jash vishal.
Sant jan soī sadā mohe bhāve...Sant jan soī sadā mohe bhāve... Deh _____ aru man ādik ke, sangme nahi lapțāve... sant 1
questions.explanation: The Kirtan states: 'Deh îndriya aru man ādik ke, sangme nahi lapțāve'.

questions.question_text: Aganit vishvanī re, utpatti pālan pralay thāy; Mārī marjī vinā re, koīthī _____ nav today..7
questions.explanation: The Kirtan says: 'Mārī marjī vinā re, koīthī tarņu nav today'.
